en.title: hardware **components**
en.text:
10x servos FT5325
2xSERVO FT6560M(60KG)
2x servo sg90
14x servos MG996r
2x arduino mega
1x camera
2x speaker
1x microphone
1x PIR sensor
2x ultrasonic
10xfinger sensor
kinnect sensor
1x raspberry pi
1x power supply
